xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 28 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has quit 06:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 08:13 <sdumitriu> has quit 08:16 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 09:04 <groundnuty> has quit 09:06 <groundnuty> has joined #phenotips 11:37 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 12:27 <akats> has joined #phenotips 12:27 <akats> Beat it. But it's not really nice, because it loads eagerly rather than lazily. 12:27 <sdumitriu> Oh, that's fine 12:27 <sdumitriu> It's even better 13:25 <bvancea> has joined #phenotips 13:26 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 13:26 <sdumitriu> How's it going? 13:26 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 13:26 <sdumitriu> Busy with school? 13:26 <bvancea> ah, just finished a really busy week 13:26 <bvancea> yeah 13:26 <bvancea> had a couple of deadlines 13:27 <bvancea> its a bit better now :D 13:27 <bvancea> and you? 13:27 <sdumitriu> Trying hard to release three things today 13:28 <bvancea> wow, that is a quite a schedule 13:29 <bvancea> phenotips/phenome-central? 13:29 <sdumitriu> Yes 13:33 <sdumitriu> I just sent this an hour ago: http://mail.phenotips.org/pipermail/devs/2014-March/000079.html 13:34 <sdumitriu> If you could lend a hand, that would be wonderful 13:34 <bvancea> sure 13:43 <bvancea> any new feature you want me to check? 13:44 <sdumitriu> Not particularly, just hammer at it until it breaks 13:44 <bvancea> okay :)) 13:51 <bvancea> should I be able to access a hidden patient case if I'm not logged in? 13:55 <sdumitriu> No 13:55 <sdumitriu> Unless you created it 13:55 <sdumitriu> (as guest) 13:56 <bvancea> Hmmm 13:56 <bvancea> Well, this is what I did 13:56 <bvancea> I created a patient as admin 13:57 <bvancea> changed ownership to a bogus user : 22222222 13:57 <bvancea> logged out 13:57 <sdumitriu> Hm... 13:57 <bvancea> searched for P00000 in the search bar 13:57 <sdumitriu> That's a bug 13:57 <bvancea> and I can see the patient 13:57 <bvancea> even though its hidden 14:05 <bvancea> everything else seems fine 14:05 <bvancea> I'll go have dinner and have another look 14:06 <sdumitriu> Thank you 14:31 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 16:03 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 16:05 <bvancea> Hey sdumitriu 16:05 <bvancea> I've found another small issue 16:05 <sdumitriu> Hey again 16:05 <sdumitriu> Shoot 16:06 <bvancea> When editing a patient record, in the section Clinical symptoms and physical findings 16:07 <bvancea> if you search for something on the quick phenotipe search 16:07 <bvancea> then you check the checkbox this patient is clinically normal 16:07 <bvancea> you get a residual result window 16:07 <bvancea> that doesn't go away by clicking outside 16:07 <bvancea> its pretty minor 16:10 <sdumitriu> I see 16:10 <sdumitriu> There's a "hide suggestions" link in the top right corner, you know 16:10 <sdumitriu> Although nobody seems to see it 16:10 <sdumitriu> Bottom right too 16:16 <akats> sdumitriu: would you like to take a look at what I have? 16:16 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:22 <mcupak> has quit 16:28 <bvancea> has quit 16:55 <bvancea> has joined #phenotips 16:56 <bvancea> has quit 18:30 <akats> has quit 20:42 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]>
